text: "Twisting by the Pool" is a 1983 song by Dire Straits and was taken from their EP ExtendedancEPlay. It went to number 14 in the United Kingdom, number 18 in Canada, number 2 in Australia, number 1 in New Zealand, number 6 in Norway and the Netherlands, number 13 in Sweden and Ireland and number 11 in Switzerland. ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:Dire Straits songs
title: Twisting by the Pool
